titles.title: To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp on the subject of inflammatory bowel disease.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/31/2008--Introduced. Directs the Postmaster General to issue a commemorative, first-class postage stamp on Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis, two chronic digestive diseases collectively known as inflammatory bowel disease.
